achievements.content: I learned how to count to 100 today! My teacher gave me a gold star and I'm so proud of myself. Math is becoming my favorite subject!
Built my first LEGO tower that's taller than me! It has 50 blocks and didn't fall down. My mom helped me count all the pieces.
Read my first chapter book all by myself! 'The Magic Tree House' was so exciting. I can't wait to read the next one in the series.
Won the school's art competition with my rainbow painting! All my friends said it was beautiful and the colors were so bright.
Helped my teacher take care of our class pet rabbit, Mr. Fluffy. I learned how to feed him carrots and clean his cage properly.
